title: Flexing So Hard
lyrics:
I-I-I'm flexing so hard turning bank into stripper club
2 phone in my pocket I'm so lucky I get famous yah
My money too longer (woosh) I can't count it up
I'm flexing so hard
Bitch I roll that I don't smoke that

如果不想做的事也莫的人鼓捣你切

你是个type 3 的人类肯定fuck with my shit

I have an interesting soul just like my interesting flow

面包和梦想做选择 I show you how I get both

Uh yah what they talk what they talk

一年前I was broke look at me now I'm a pro

We gonna make a history ay

Girl come to give me a kiss ay

Who's your favorite rapper now

All the way higher gang Ma Si Wei



最后一名的人没有资格跟到我们耍

大学没有毕业那也没有什么问题啊

当老板不用请假 我在大草原骑马

明天就待家里打游戏 后天就飞夏威夷

麻烦别靠那么近 我们又不认识你

Asia boy讲礼貌说一句很抱歉没有关系

今天我低调的气质像gentleman他们在猜测我年龄

明天是model在时装周走秀挂两个goyard包搭配Versace

Vlone Bape Nike shoes I play, you watch

Friday 酒吧 VIP 待遇 like me Psy.P

生活就像导演Spike Lee 拍的电视剧



I flexing so hard driving 没有driving license, woah

I flexing so hard my tooth 都镶满 diamond

Yeah I'm a money tree

Who wanna be my neighborhood?

机场托运Gucci bag

Rich like Gucci Mane

钱花了努力赚 什么也买求不起

曾经也一贫如洗

但是我从不怀疑

他们都全部都等待我的跌倒

Better me, better me 变得越来越好

Family family enemy finally made me move to

比福利 Hills

Too many skills

Murder kills

Dollar dollar bills

Tell me how you feel

放包里头

凌晨五点离开studio

回家之前打个 booty call



I'm flexing so hard, what's the meaning？

举个例子

就好比我们的距离 是游乐园旋转的木马

每圈你都跟在我后面 嗯

黄的黑的白的girl 换来换去孩子气

I keep it G

YouTube买了个beat

火到 I can't believe

I'm 卖保险 I'm interesting

I got melody and RMB

I'm Type 3 in da season 3

从来都不丢人 爱丢Supreme

Your better know

My gang gang 不是普通gang gang

Flexing flexing 不一般的gang gang

高矮胖瘦 全都有的gang gang

V.v.v.s.i.c.e的gang gang



Flexing? You call this flexing?

All you do is listen to Higher Brothers all day

How about you get a girlfriend, get a job, save your money

Come on now, that's flexing

I'm flexing so hard turning bank into stripper club

2 phone in my pocket I'm so lucky I get famous yah

My money too longer (woosh) I can't count it up

I'm flexing so hard

Bitch I roll that I don't smoke that
